ygData.subject: magic resist
ygData.msgSnippet: Just curious,  what s everyone s magic resist at?  Mine is somewhere like 45-49 with my own buffs.  With a cleric or bard, I ve seen it somewhere in the high
ygData.messageBody:
Just curious, what's everyone's magic resist at? Mine is somewhere like
45-49 with my own buffs. With a cleric or bard, I've seen it somewhere in
the high 80s.

Anybody know a more consistent way to keep this higher? I wish we had a
personal buff to boost this up more...you'd figure a master of magic would
have more resistance in this area? :)

I got that Thex dagger thingie that boosts SV disease up +50. That's nice
but I wish there was something like that for magic resist.

-- Lim'Dul
